author: isurues
msg: createSOAPMessageWithoutSchema method was not consuming all the values for a particular key. Fixed it..

author: norman
msg: Use threadpools for mail spooling and also expose them via JMX. See JAMES-1283

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-576: added front-end to retrieve backups and to restore froma backup file

author: rhuijben
msg: In the working code upgrade code: Check the entry data for which nodes are
directories instead of just checking what there is on disk. This handles
obstructions and missing directories in a better way and avoids at least
a stat per file and/or hidden directory.
(maybe_add_subdir): Fold this function into its only caller.
(get_versioned_subdirs): Add skip_missing argument and use svn_wc_entry_t to
check if a node is a subdirectory.
